男人.name: 男人
男人.profile_text: The man with short brown hair, standard facial features, and a military aura. He wears a slim-fit dark green shirt and moves with precise and disciplined steps. He has a mysterious and ancient vibe.

刻耳柏洛斯.name: 刻耳柏洛斯
刻耳柏洛斯.profile_text: A three-headed creature named Cerberus, symbolizing death and destruction. Each head has greenish-blue flames and emits a terrifying heat. Its sharp teeth contain lethal venom, and its howls are like horns from the depths of hell.
